org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.util

Class PluginBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.util.PluginBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<Object>

    public class PluginBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<Object>
    Builder class to instantiate and configure a Plugin object using a PluginFactory method or PluginBuilderFactory builder class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginBuilder(PluginType<?> pluginType)
      Constructs a PluginBuilder for a given PluginType.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object build()
      Builds the plugin object.
      PluginBuilder forLogEvent(LogEvent event)
      Specifies the LogEvent that may be used to provide extra localContext for string substitutions.
      PluginBuilder withConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
      Specifies the Configuration to use for constructing the plugin instance.
      PluginBuilder withConfigurationNode(Node node)
      Specifies the Node corresponding to the plugin object that will be created.
